com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.xml

Class MappingXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.xml.MappingXML

  • public abstract class MappingXML
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that wrappers the parsing of the mapping.xml file. The mapping.xml file is the base structure for the entire application.

    The XML parsing is done using the VTD-XML parser.
    Author:
    Karl Parry

    • Method Detail

      • parseMappingXML

        public static Database parseMappingXML(java.lang.String path)
                                throws CrashException
        The main method that parses the mapping.xml file. Throws an Exception if an issue occurs.
        Parameters:
        path - The Path to the mapping.xml file including "/mapping.xml". If one is not provided it is assumed it is in the root directory.
        Returns:
        The initialised Database object with all the look ups, Xpaths and special values.
        Throws:
        CrashException

      • getErrorHandling

        private static ErrorDatabase getErrorHandling(com.ximpleware.VTDNav vn)
                                       throws com.ximpleware.XPathParseException,
                                              com.ximpleware.XPathEvalException,
                                              com.ximpleware.NavException
        Gets the error database information from the mapping.xml file.
        Parameters:
        vn - the VTDNav to reset back to root location once completed
        Returns:
        The ErrorDatabase object with the setup values from the mapping.xml
        Throws:
        com.ximpleware.XPathParseException
        com.ximpleware.XPathEvalException
        com.ximpleware.NavException
